2014 dayata kirula jathika sanwardhana wadasatahanata anuwa kagalla disthrikkaya thula kagalla sanwardhana wyapruthi 3450k pamana aarambha kara athi bawa widuli sandesha ha thorathuru thakshana amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya mahatha pawasiya.me sandaha labadi athi mudala rupiyal 20,95,818,379ki.me anuwa mathru sayana nawa idikirim 31kda mathru sayana wadi diyunu kirim 74kda, podu godanagili 19kda jala wyapruthi 35kda, gramiya marga konkrit kirim 2065kda sulu warimarga 189kda, mawanalla pradeshiya lekam kottasaye niwasa wadasatahan 1037kda kriyathmaka kirimata piyawara gena atha.me wanawita gramiya marga 141k konkrit kirima nimawa athi athara sulu warimarga 7kada, jala wyapruthi 2kada wada awasan kara atha..
